snippet: “The Dude and the Zen Master” is an incomplete and spotty guide to Zen philosophy, where sometimes the Dude-ism and the Buddhism mix in a helpful way.
abstract: Mark Oppenheimer reviews book The Dude and the Zen Master by Jeff Bridges and Bernie Glassman.
lead_paragraph: “The Dude and the Zen Master” is an incomplete and spotty guide to Zen philosophy, where sometimes the Dude-ism and the Buddhism mix in a helpful way.

headline.seo: Jeff Bridges and Bernie Glassman’s ‘Dude and the Zen Master’
headline.main: If Lebowski Calls, Will You Be in? Or Out Bowling?
headline.print_headline: If Lebowski Calls, Will You Be In? Or Out Bowling?
